data.title: Industrial zone Nemetin
data.text:
The Industrial Zone Nemetin with an area of over 100 ha belongs to the category of large industrial zones. The zone is equipped with full infrastructure: roads, stormwater and sanitary water drainage, public lighting, water supply, gas supply, electricity, telephone services, heating (biogas...)

ENTREPRENEURIAL ZONE „IT PARK“

The Entrepreneurial Zone “IT Park” Osijek is a specialized micro-economic zone. It is intended for companies operating in the Information Technology (IT) sector. It is located in the wider city center and has good traffic connections. Public transport is available right next to the zone (tram...

INCENTIVES FOR INVESTMENT IN THE REPUBLIC OF CROATIA

The Act on Investment Promotion and Improving the Investment Climate (“Official Gazette” 111/12 and 28/13) regulates incentive measures for investment projects in economic activities on the territory of the Republic of Croatia. These measures relate to investment and enhancement projects...
